awesome game but Ravenholm was terrifying

This is probably one of the most must plays in the history of gaming. This game basically revolutionized gaming first person shooters. I can't expose too much, but if you have this game on your wishlist, get it. The story is just the main reason for playing this game. The graphics still hold up even to this day. The sound design is amazing as well. This game does have a few scares, and the environments really immerse you. Must play. 10/10
"Rise and shine, Mister Freeman - rise and... shine.

I played all 3 games of the Half-Life 2 series this weekend. I had dabbled with them when I was a kid and they had first come out. The game was beautiful for it's time, and has some pretty neat gadgets  and puzzles like the gravity gun. That being said, the story and world are so stupid it's mind melting. If this was just a FPS with neat combat, then no problem. But it tries so hard to be a story. About 40% of the game is story sequences. Which means, because it has a terrible terrible story, it's super boring as a game. Not worth.

Best game i have ever played gameplay 9/10 immersion 10/10 characters 9/10 interactive 10/10 story building 10/10 enemies 9.8/10 enemy placement 10/10 ext. nothing goes below a 9 even the graphics for a game made in 2004 that is insane overall experience a solid 9.9 to a 10

its the sequel to the game that revolutionized first person shooters, and video games in general. I could give you a 3 page essay on how good this game is but instead i want you to wonder why so many people want an actual third game and why HL: A sold so wel;. Another classic valve sequel

spettacolare, magnifico, stupendo, quasi quanto la nona sinfonia di rosa chemical. ci ho giocato abbastanza per dire che dottore gratisuomo o per gli amici liberouomo (real american) è un personaggio che parla quanto un sordo muto, solo muto, perché ci sente fin troppo. la trama è stupenda quasi quanto quella di fortnite. gameplay valido se raggiungi i 4 cromosomi e hai le mani per toccare la tastiera. la grafica è alta classe, mario 64 spostati. insomma stupendo quanto un viaggio in medio oriente con la bandiera americana

I beat this back on the 360 as part of the Orange Box. It was great then. It's great now. The level design, sound design, and music are all major highlights here. The music when you get the HEV suit is insanely awesome.
